result.title: Invitation to 24 Hrs of Code
result.content:
Dear All,

Greetings from CodeBuddy !!!

We are organizing a contest named 24 Hrs Of Code. We invite you to showcase your coding skills among some of the cool programmers. Utilize your summer time and try your hands on some of the exciting problems. Below are the contest details :
  • Contest Link : https://codebuddy.co.in/contests/24HOC
  • Time : 30th May 2017 12 PM IST â€” 31st May 2017 12 PM IST
See you on the leaderboard !!!

Regards,
Team CodeBuddy
